answers.answer: Hello,In pregnancy, target fasting is < 95 mg/DL (ideally in range of 70 - 85),2 hours after eating < 120 (ideally is 80 - 100 range).Hope this helps.  Control is pregnancy is very important to minimise effects on the baby.

question: What are the sugar levels to be kept to go for pregnancy? Both Fasting & PP levels needed that will need to be acheived & kept constant throughout the pregnancy.
title: Diabetes & Pregnancy
